nodes.text: Hoverbuggies were a type of repulsorpod used on the planet Valo. Supreme Chancellor Lina Soh of the Galactic Republic and her party of Republic delegates and Jedi used hoverbuggies during a tour of Lonisa City, Valo's capital, led by Coordinator Samera Ra-oon. The sound of the repulsorpods reminded Jedi Master Stellan Gios of the gentle purring of a Felinx.
Hoverbuggies appeared in the 2021 novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm, written by Cavan Scott.
